item.description:
Hi All!

Let's get together for a Saturday of dancing, drinks and craziness! It is time we hit the clubs and this is going to be THE event of Boston Fashion week!

Join us! I will be at the venue at the start of the party, so just come whenever is convenient for you! I'll send my cell phone number to those who RSVP YES to get in touch with me when you arrive. I would love to see new faces join us!


Official details are listed below.

# Note the ticket information - I strongly suggest you get your tickets online before the event. You can get a "combo ticket" for both the Friday night Emerging Trends Fashion Show AND Saturday night party! I will be at both, so make a weekend out of it!

I'll see you next Friday and Saturday! Email if you have any questions!

~Beth




This RED CARPET EVENT is brought to you by BAKU SUNSET, THE SYNERGY EVENTS, and BLU!

Celebrate this year's most stylist fashion week Red Carpet party with the runway models, fashion designers, stylists and photographers that made Boston Fashion Week 2009 possible.

Fashion photography trail by selected Fashion Week photographers!
Photoshoot by Octavian Boca Photography
Free sample vodka shots by Zodiak Vodka
Makeovers and gift bags for guests by top beauty salons of Boston
Best dressed male and female announced and awarded at Midnight

Special Guest DJs: DJ Reaz and DJ Farhan spinning Euro House and Top 40 House Remixes, accompanied by a Live Percussionist. DJ Farhan will also be celebrating his birthday at midnight.

LISTEN TO THEIR MIXES ONLINE: http://www.esnips.com...

Dress code: Fashionably Chic.
Must be over 21+ for admission.

If you are a photographer of the Boston Fashion Week '09 and would like to submit your photos for a photo trail of this year's event, please email:

bostonfashion@theSYNERGYevents.com and include
"BFW Celebration Party" in subject line.

Online Tickets (Limited Tickets Available):

http://bfw.ticketleap...

Option 1: Admission tickets at $20 online (save $5 until Sep 15th). Ticket prices will be higher at the door.

Option 2: A $50 Ticket includes admission to the Celebration Party and a general Admission ticket to 2nd Annual The Emerging Trends 2009.
SAVE $20 AND WITNESS ONE OF THE BIGGEST YEARLY FASHIONS SHOWS IN BOSTON!

Partial proceedings will go to benefit Mirvari International Foundation charity organization (Mirvari.org).

http://www.BakuSunset...
http://www.theemergin...
http://blurestaurant....

Sponsored by:

Pure Blu Jeans
Salon Acote
Marc Harris Salon
Red Bull
Zodiac Vodka
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my cell phone # to those who RSVP yes!
item.name: Boston Fashion Week Celebration Party
